description: A wrapper for FSL tools to process anatomical scans.

structural_image.title: Structural Image
structural_image.description: Filename of input image (for one image only)

existing_anat_dir.title: Existing Anat Directory
existing_anat_dir.description: Directory name for existing .anat directory where this script will be run in place

output_dir.title: Output Directory
output_dir.description: Basename of directory for output (default is input image basename followed by .anat)

clobber_flag.title: Clobber Flag
clobber_flag.description: If .anat directory exists (as specified by -o or default from -i) then delete it and make a new one

strongbias_flag.title: Strong Bias Flag
strongbias_flag.description: Used for images with very strong bias fields

weakbias_flag.title: Weak Bias Flag
weakbias_flag.description: Used for images with smoother, more typical, bias fields (default setting)

noreorient_flag.title: No Reorient Flag
noreorient_flag.description: Turn off step that does reorientation to standard (fslreorient2std)

nocrop_flag.title: No Crop Flag
nocrop_flag.description: Turn off step that does automated cropping (robustfov)

nobias_flag.title: No Bias Correction Flag
nobias_flag.description: Turn off steps that do bias field correction (via FAST)

noreg_flag.title: No Registration Flag
noreg_flag.description: Turn off steps that do registration to standard (FLIRT and FNIRT)

nononlinreg_flag.title: No Non-linear Registration Flag
nononlinreg_flag.description: Turn off step that does non-linear registration (FNIRT)

noseg_flag.title: No Segmentation Flag
noseg_flag.description: Turn off step that does tissue-type segmentation (FAST)

nosubcortseg_flag.title: No Sub-cortical Segmentation Flag
nosubcortseg_flag.description: Turn off step that does sub-cortical segmentation (FIRST)

bias_smoothing.title: Bias Smoothing Value
bias_smoothing.description: Specify the value for bias field smoothing (the -l option in FAST)

image_type.title: Image Type
image_type.description: Specify the type of image (choose one of T1 T2 PD - default is T1)

nosearch_flag.title: No Search Flag
nosearch_flag.description: Specify that linear registration uses the -nosearch option (FLIRT)

bet_f_param.title: BET f Parameter
bet_f_param.description: Specify f parameter for BET (only used if not running non-linear reg and also wanting brain extraction done)
